<h1 align="center">Apollo Server Demo</h1>

Apollo Server is a GraphQL server that can be used with any JavaScript-based HTTP server framework. In this demo, I will be using Express.

---------------

## Table of Contents

- [Getting Started](#getting-started)
- [Resources](#resources)
- [License](#license)
- [Credits](#credits)

## Getting Started

1. Clone the repository

```bash
git clone
```

2. Install dependencies

```bash
npm install
```

3. Start the server

```bash
npm start
```

4. Open the GraphQL Playground

```bash
http://localhost:4000/
```

## Resources

The code in this repository was created by following a tutorial written by **Apollo Docs** and can be found at the following links:

- [Apollo Server Docs](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/apollo-server/getting-started/)
- [Apollo Server Tutorial](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/tutorial/introduction/)
- [TypeScript Docs](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/)
- [GraphQL Docs](https://graphql.org/learn/)
